product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaGloss Bomb Cream Color Drip Lip Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeFENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna's Gloss Bomb Cream is the cult-fave lip gloss, now with pure, creamy color and incredible shine, that instantly leaves lips looking smoother and more voluminous.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreamy color, irresistible shineBuildable full-intensity pigment5 universally flattering shadesNon-sticky feelXXL wand applies in just one swipeLight peach-vanilla scentKey IngredientsVitamin A to nourish lipsFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensItem 2592398How To UseWear alone or layer over lipstick.Layer to increase color intensity.Artistry Pro Tip: plays especially well with Stunna Lip Paint. Layer to increase color intensity.IngredientsPolybutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyethylene, Silica, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Tribehenin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Retinyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mica, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Citric Acid. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wear alone or layer over lipstick.Layer to increase color intensity.Artistry Pro Tip: plays especially well with Stunna Lip Paint. Layer to increase color intensity.

reviews.headline: Glow for days
reviews.comments: The vanilla scent, the gloss, the shine. She's the it girl when it comes to smooth texture without the stick. Packaging is eye catching without being too much. This gloss is infused with Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Passionfruit Oil + Hyaluronic Filling Spheres so it's extremely hydrating. Just go get it. Don't second guess it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again!!
reviews.comments: I love the feeling of this gloss and it has just enough of a tint so it can easily be applied over a lipstick.

reviews.headline: I absolutely luv it!
reviews.comments: This lip cream is beautiful than I imagined. I paired it with the matching lip pencil and it looked amazing. 10 out of 10

reviews.headline: Best lips gloss ever
reviews.comments: So creamy, it's exactly what I wanted will definitely buy it again

reviews.headline: I like but unsure if I would buy it again.
reviews.comments:
Honey Waffle and Cookie Jar. 
I feel somewhat conflicted about this product. Rhianna is a cool tone girl so it works out perfectly for me cause I'm a dark hair, bright winter flow- cool olive. Yellow-green undertone. References for foundation Smashbox LN20 and Halo Light Olive. ABH 220N foundation. Tarte 22N concealer. I wear 120 and 130 concealer in Fenty. The gloss colors are so unique and wonderful for complimenting my skin. I don't look good in warm lipsticks. Do you know how hard it is to find a Orange Brown lip gloss or a Honey Butter Cream Yellow without clashing on my hyperpigmentation or washing me out?! Very difficult.  I finally found a more muted cool toned and soft color of a color I've been searching for. It looks good because of the unique color, it feels hydrating...I have not tried it on dehydrated lips. That's the true test. I always thought Tartes Maracuja balms and plumps are deeply hydrating. I have a small collection of glosses so that's why I bought them. I can't wear these with lip liners destroys the liners themselves. I have matte and really good ones that stay on but the Fenty gloss doesn't allow them to stay on. Toofaced and ABH lip glosses work well with all my lip liners. I cannot  recommend it unless you solely will just wear the gloss by itself. I would not buy it again if I could wear it with a liner.  I wanted a gloss I could wear in all circumstances.

reviews.headline: excelente calidad
reviews.comments: los gloss de font beauty me encantan mucho y este es demasiado lindo pigmenta super bien

reviews.headline: I want this in more colors!
reviews.comments: Hydrating, cushiony, non plumping, great color, and not sticky. Overall, a great gloss but the fruit punch smell is a bit strong.
I LOVE THE COLOR, ITS SO MOISTURIZING

reviews.headline: Not the best, but it's ok
reviews.comments: I bought this in the color mauve wives.  I love the color, the smell and texture, but it doesn't stay in place.  Even with lipliner it runs below my lips.  That is my only complaint.  I got it at half price so I am thankful I didn't spend full price for it.  Not my favorite product.  Won't purchase again.

reviews.headline: NICE SHINE TO LIPS
reviews.comments: LOVE IT

reviews.headline: Lovely
reviews.comments: Soft and natural for everyday wear!

reviews.headline: Honestly its just another lipgloss
reviews.comments: i had high hopes because ive tried other glossbombs but this one is underwhelming

reviews.headline: I love these.
reviews.comments:
I purchased two shades Mauve wive$ and Fenty Glow. I love both colors. They are not a full pigmentation but they are not sheer either they just leave a nice shiny pigmentation on your lips. They have a nice cushy feeling on your lips, they are not sticky and last a decent amount of time.
I will definitely be buying more colors of these.

reviews.headline: Love this smmmüò©
reviews.comments:
I feel like this product is so creamy and pigmentedüòòthe only teeny tiny issue I have is I was expecting it to be a lil shiny (btw I got Cookie Jar) because the picture makes it look like it has a bit of a glisten to it! 

Other than this non issue this is my new favorite lip gloss

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: I had been eyeing the color fenty glow for a while and snagged it while on sale and I'm so glad I did! It wears nicely cause it's not sticky and color does last a few hours before having to reapplying

reviews.headline: Fenty lip gloss
reviews.comments: Amazing I love the color on me. I love a natural face of make up and this just goes so well with a natural face ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: love it!
reviews.comments: I purchased the shade fruit snacks in the gloss bomb cream cream, it is so moisturizing, and not sticky at all. thought I would take the chance and bought it 50% off.  glad I did. recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Gloss Bomb Cream Color Drip Lip Cream
reviews.comments: This is literally my favorite lip gloss ever! I love that this is a lip cream so it leaves such a gorgeous color on my lips that surprisignly stays on for a while! I highly recommend this lip gloss! Specifically Fenty Gloss

reviews.headline: I have to have it!
reviews.comments: Just one concern is that it doesn't last long, however I love this product, and I would definitely buy the Fenty Gloss bomb again. So as not to run out I'm going to get another one today.  Also, the cream color blends well with my darker lip stick

reviews.headline: I love this product.
reviews.comments: I would buy it again.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Honey Waffle and Cookie Jar. 
I feel somewhat conflicted about this product. Rhianna is a cool tone girl so it works out perfectly for me cause I'm a dark hair, bright winter flow- cool olive. Yellow-green undertone. References for foundation Smashbox LN20 and Halo Light Olive. ABH 220N foundation. Tarte 22N concealer. I wear 120 and 130 concealer in Fenty. The gloss colors are so unique and wonderful for complimenting my skin. I don't look good in warm lipsticks. Do you know how hard it is to find a Orange Brown lip gloss or a Honey Butter Cream Yellow without clashing on my hyperpigmentation or washing me out?! Very difficult. faceoff_positive.headline: I like but unsure if I would buy it again.

faceoff_negative.comments: The lipgloss has the right ideas but the thing leaks like crazy. This is not a throw it in your purse type of gloss unless you want it everywhere when you open it. It leaks to a point where when you open it, it ends up all over the place and wates soooo much product. I havent even ised it much and the bottle is already half gone. The applicator is big and nice. The consistency of it can get runny sometimes whoch then also causes mess. I guess if its warmer it gets runny. My lips eat this stuff, i usually have to reapply within the hour or so. Other than that its ok. Would i buy it again? Absolutely not.
faceoff_negative.headline: The color is pretty
